solution_line_template: Half off the full price of ${full_price} is ${full_price}/{half_off_divisor}=${<<{full_price}/{half_off_divisor}={discount_amount}>>}{discount_amount} off.
Thus, for the two rackets, Paul spends ${full_price}+${full_price}-${discount_amount}=${<<{full_price}+{full_price}-{discount_amount}={total_spent}>>}{total_spent}.
